display_title.display_title:
République centrafricaine –
            Projet de développement de l’élevage et de gestion des
            parcours : étude d’impact environnemental

docna.cdata!:
Central African Republic - Projet de
            Developpement de l'Elevage et de Gestion des Parcours :
            etude d'impact environnemental

repnme.cdata!:
Central African Republic - Projet de
            Developpement de l'Elevage et de Gestion des Parcours :
            etude d'impact environnemental

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the project is to
            increase livestock production in the Central African
            Republic.  This study makes the following recommendations:
            1) recruitment of a national advisor responsible for
            addressing environmental issues and reporting to the
            Ministry of Agriculture and Livestock; 2) management
            training; 3) develop a strategy of land allocation to help
            increase livestock production while controlling the
            resulting soil erosion; 4) increase agricultural production;
            5) protect flaura and fauna by assigning nature reserves; 6)
            design better methods of animal disease control; 7) increase
            control measures to protect livestock from ticks and tsetse
            flyes; 8) land management; and 9) water resource management.
